DOC.brief_summary: Aim of the study is to investigate specific effects of acupuncture points.
DOC.brief_title: Stimulation of Gastric Slow Waves With Acupuncture at St36 and Pe6 - a Randomized Single-blind Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteers BMI between 17.5 and 25 3 hours before the experiment no food 3 hours before the experiment only water, and 1 hour before the experiment no fluid intake 4 hours before the experiment no smoking informed consent acupuncture treatment during the last 12 months chronic disease regular intake of medication which influence autonomic nervous system or GI tract pregnant or breast feeding drug or substance abuse
